reputation.tooltip:
Your Reputation in this kingdom provides you with either a <style="value">Discount</style> - if good reputation - or <style="value">Premium</style> - if bad reputation - to the cost when <style="status">Interacting</style> with the local population (recruiting, healing, etc).


If your Reputation is too low, the locals will refuse to deal with you.
reputation.name: Reputation
reputation.interaction.disallowed: Your Reputation is too poor and locals <style="value">Refuse</style> to deal with you for any kind of Interaction.
